newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Tamsa started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Tamsa started as buy.

text.p: -- Caspian analyst Sandra Morfin started Mexico's sole seamless pipe producer Tubos de Acero de Mexico (Tamsa) with a buy rating at a price of $11.38.
-- Said it has projected earnings growth of 238 percent in 1996 and 30 percent in 1997 with a stock that is undervalued.

-- Sees Tamsa offering an estimated 21 percent return on equity for 1997, excluding monetary and foreign exchange non-cash effects, "the highest among its international peers and other steel producers in Mexico."
-- Her 12-month price target is $14.75 per ADR, representing a total return of 30 percent in dollar terms.
